CD4 cell count least 100 cells/mm3 within 30 day study entry . Over 500 HIV1 RNA copies/ml measure Roche Amplicor Ultra Sensitive Assay within 30 day study entry . Treatmentexperienced patient must document HIV RNA value less equal 100,000 copies/ml within 30 day study entry . Prior Treatment : Excluded : Acute therapy infection medical illness . Acute therapy must complete 14 day prior time study entry . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Malignancy require systemic therapy . For purpose study , intolerance define recurrent toxicity require dose interruption dose reduction permanent discontinuation drug ( Grade 3 4 anemia ) .
